name: International Conference on Clinical Microbiology
content: Scisynopsis meetings is pleased to invite you for the upcoming event on ‘’International Conferences on Clinical Microbiology’’ which is going to be held on March 20-21, 2023 in Rome (Italy). The main theme of this conference is ‘’Exploring Research Advance’s in Clinical Microbiology’’. Scisynopsis conference kindly invites all higher official persons, professors, student, and delegate/listeners to share their knowledge and research in the platform of clinical microbiology conference. Each and every one Elevate your knowledge by attending this conference.
